nodes.text: The S-class light star cruiser was a starship model used by the Sith Empire during or before the Cold War.
The ship was regarded as old by the Galactic Republic in the time leading up to the Battle of Sebaddon.

A ship of this design was possibly taken and modified by hex droids.
Footage of the destroyed ship Cinzia showed signs of the vessel being a heavily modified craft, with a refurbished hull over an Imperial-made chassis, possibly a S-class one. Imperial Intelligence agent Ula Vii speculated upon seeing the footage that the ship had been stripped down and rebuilt from the inside-out. The ship's drive units were also similar to the S-class's, but their emissions were baffled.
